title: The monolith must die! - How to convince managers
description:
You have a code monolith. Yey, congrats! - Oh, you don't want to have a monolith? Why not?


For years, we have mostly talked about how to move from monolith to microservices on a technical level. To me, also the business view is interesting and important. Let's discuss when the breakdown of a monolith is worth investing money and developer time. This will provide you with all the arguments for the next round of management discussions.


As scientific foundation, we will use the DORA metrics by Google.
